flawed_nl_solution:
Lisa took 10 x 3 = <<10*3=30>>30 photos of flowers.
She took 30 - 10 = <<30-10=30>>30 photos of the scenery.
So, Lisa took 10 + 30 + 30 = <<10+30+30=70>>70 photos this week.
Therefore, Lisa took 70 - 15 = <<70-15=55>>55 photos last weekend.
#### 55

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 30. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
